title: got banned for intentionally feeding can riot help me?
body:
i saw another few players go banned for intentional feeding but its just our skill level and getting matched with higher level players. i already submitted a ticket and talked to live support but no help. i am coming to the forums here because i saw another person got unbanned, so i am hoping another riot can look at my account

thank you

edit: please dont post if you are not riot support

replies.body: As OP has said they do not wish for community discussion to take place, this thread is being closed/locked. If you have any questions about this please do not hesitate to contact us in the [Boards Moderation Discord server](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).

it's intentional, therefore no
don't run down mid and sell all your items for tears/mobis and you're fine

i dont know if you can watch the replay but i didnt do that. if you look at all my match history, if i lose, i always sell all my item or buy tears

also u are not from riot so i dont think you should post on my thread. i reported your post

>also u are not from riot so i dont think you should post on my thread

that's neither here nor there. a rioter would have said the same thing
The boards are not where you go for Riot responses, the boards are for community feedback.

1. why the living fk would i spend 30 minutes of my life to prove you wrong on something i give less than a shit about
2. its a bot doing this stuff probs so tears=tears
You constantly int. If the ban is wrongfully applied you can get it reviewed, in this case I feel it's 100% deserved.
can non riot support stop posting here, i have to report this now
Can you not go to the community boards and get mad when the community calls you out on your inting?
That's not how it works.

If you wanted Riot Support to answer your question, then you should post in [Help & Support](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M). Riot support does not frequent this board, though Tantram (and a couple others) occasionally pop in here or there. [Attysu The Poro's comment](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/VMh2u1Gk-got-banned-for-intentionally-feeding-can-riot-help-me?comment=000a) is the most accurate. This is also what Riot Support Poros will likely tell you in the Help & Support board.

If you already have a ticket, and you are looking for them to respond, posting in the community feedback-focused player behavior board is not going to get support to respond any faster.

If you would like to appeal your ban, you'll have to submit a ticket to [Riot Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) as we can't do much for you here alone. If you can provide chatlogs, I'd be happy to look into your logs and see what could've possibly triggered your ban!

Also; you cannot report other users for posting on your thread if they are not Riot Support, Player Behavior is an open board for everyone to post in as long as they're respectful and following the [Universal Rules](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules).

Yes its very frustrating to want to speak to riot while all you have is the boards. I wish there was a way to speak and almost garentee a answer without any else saying anything. I would probably put that function on the bottom of the page and you would get to it by clicking the Support text. too bad we're stuck with this

https://imgur.com/a/zZYyS

looks deserved to me...

also you have a death almost every minute. who are you trying to kid here?
Your match history is publicly accessible. Don't insult us.
please if you are not riot support dont post

riot support isn't here. these are the boards. if you want to talk to riot support, tickets are the only way

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=The CREAM Demon,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VMh2u1Gk,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-01-16T01:05:11.246+0000)
>
> please if you are not riot support dont post

If you want Riot support send in a support ticket.

If you're posting a thread on a **_public_** forum, anyone can post here.

Also I've looked at your match history. There are plenty of games that are obvious cases of feeding and trolling. The ban was correctly applied and is not likely to get lifted.

Get better.


-Riot support

Bans for intentional feeding are way less common than bans for flame, this because it's hard to differentiate inting and just being bad, so if you've been banned for it that means it's an obvious case of Intentional feeding.

>edit: please dont post if you are not riot support

Now this is funny, dude, there is something called **"a support ticket"** you can do one of those to get in contact with riot support, don't go on the forums if you don't want people replying to you, like seriously ???

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
you deserve to be banned why are you so mad?
Can riot tantrum come in here and put this kiddo on blast? looks like thats what its gonna take
bro you went 2-24 as teemo and bought 2 tears LOL

N


The chances of you getting unbanned are as high as the chances that someone’s comment that you reported is deleted.

It looks link you wanted to write a support ticket. You can do that, and delete your post if you don't want community feedback.

Just so you know, they do not reverse punishments unless done in error.
